subtitle: hi I'm Deborah Lynn Katz and I am the
President of the international remote
viewing Association and we could not be
more excited about having a combined
conference this year with the Monroe
Institute we're going to be in
Charlottesville Virginia August 10th
through 13th and not only are we going
to have the leading researchers and
practitioners in the field of remote
viewing but we are going to have so much
fun we're going to have game night on
Thursday night and we're going to have a
talent show on Friday night and on
Saturday night we're going to have a
banquet and a whole group psychokinetic
experience followed by spoon bending and
also a trip to a haunted Civil War
Museum and on Sunday we're going to be
going to the Monroe Institute for a tour
and optional meditation experience and
even for wine tasting we're going to
have experiential rooms and experimental
rooms and vendors and we're going to
have group meals together and this is
going to be such an incredible
experience to meet other like-minded
remote viewers
scifest2023.com
